trans-unit.source: Allow: In this case you will need to click “Allow” each time you run
trans-unit.target: 允许：在这种情况下，您每次运行时都需要点击“允许”

trans-unit.source: Always Allow: In this case, you will not be asked for permission when you run
trans-unit.target: 始终允许：在这种情况下，运行时不会要求您授予权限

trans-unit.source: About Git LFS
trans-unit.target: 关于Git LFS

trans-unit.source: Add a new password item using “File -> New Password Item”
trans-unit.target: 使用“文件->新密码项”添加新密码项

trans-unit.source: Authentication
trans-unit.target: 认证

trans-unit.source: Backup a single organization repository with everything else (wiki, pull requests, comments, issues etc):
trans-unit.target: 备份一个单一的组织仓库和其他所有的东西(维基,拉请求,评论,问题等)。

trans-unit.source: Backup all repositories:
trans-unit.target: 备份所有存储库。

trans-unit.source: CLI Usage is as follows:
trans-unit.target: CLI用法如下。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name in the “Keychain Item Name” box. You must provide this name to github-backup using the –keychain-name argument.
trans-unit.target: 在“钥匙串项目名称”框中输入名称。您必须使用–keychain-name参数将此名称提供给github-backup。

trans-unit.source: Enter an account name in the “Account Name” box, enter your Github username as set above. You must provide this name to github-backup using the –keychain-account argument.
trans-unit.target: 在“帐户名称”框中输入帐户名称，然后按照上面的设置输入您的Github用户名。您必须使用–keychain-account参数将此名称提供给github-backup。

trans-unit.source: Enter your Github personal access token in the “Password” box
trans-unit.target: 在“密码”框中输入您的Github个人访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: 例子

trans-unit.source: GIT 1.9+
trans-unit.target: GIT 1.9+

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Instructions on how to do this can be found on https://git-lfs.github.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何执行此操作的说明，请访问https://git-lfs.github.com。

trans-unit.source: Note: When you run github-backup, you will be asked whether you want to allow “security” to use your confidential information stored in your keychain. You have two options:
trans-unit.target: 注意：当您运行github-backup时，系统会询问您是否要允许“安全性”使用存储在钥匙串中的机密信息。您有两种选择：

trans-unit.source: Note: On Mac OSX the token can be stored securely in the user’s keychain. To do this:
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Mac OSX上，令牌可以安全地存储在用户的钥匙串中。去做这个：

trans-unit.source: Note: Password-based authentication will fail if you have two-factor authentication enabled.
trans-unit.target: 注意:如果您启用了双因素身份验证,基于密码的身份验证将失败。

trans-unit.source: Open Keychain from “Applications -> Utilities -> Keychain Access”
trans-unit.target: 从“应用程序->实用程序->钥匙串访问”中打开钥匙串

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 所需经费

trans-unit.source: The package can be used to backup an entire organization or repository, including issues and wikis in the most appropriate format (clones for wikis, json files for issues).
trans-unit.target: 该软件包可用于备份整个组织或存储库，包括最合适格式的问题和Wiki（用于Wiki的克隆，用于问题的json文件）。

trans-unit.source: This project is considered feature complete for the primary maintainer. If you would like a bugfix or enhancement and cannot sponsor the work, pull requests are welcome. Feel free to contact the maintainer for consulting estimates if desired.
trans-unit.target: 对于主维护者来说,这个项目被认为是功能完整的。如果你想进行bug修复或增强,但又不能赞助这项工作,欢迎提出拉取请求。如果需要,请随时联系维护者进行咨询估算。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.target: 通过Github使用PIP。

trans-unit.target: 通过PyPI使用PIP。

trans-unit.source: Using the Keychain on Mac OSX
trans-unit.target: 在Mac OSX上使用钥匙扣

trans-unit.source: When you use the “–lfs” option, you will need to make sure you have Git LFS installed.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ –lfs”选项时，需要确保已安装Git LFS。

trans-unit.source: backup a github user or organization
trans-unit.target: 备份github用户或组织

trans-unit.source: github-backup
trans-unit.target: github-backup

trans-unit.target: 在未来。这是不太安全的,但如果你想安排
